item.text: Block Chain technology (as well as DAOs and Dapps) has become
Block Chain technology (as well as DAOs and Dapps) has become a fashionable topic.
Block Chain technology (as well as DAOs and Dapps) has become a fashionable topic. It results in a lot of confusion around these terms, technology and real life applications.
I have started a section on my Cryptoacademy Wiki

On this page projects and platforms involving decentralized consensus, block chain technology, and used for building Distributed Applications are compared to each other. Some comparisons are pretty obvious, and directed towards people less familiar with this area. This page is inspired by [http://www.differencebetween.net/ Deffirencebetween.net]

item.title: Difference Between

story.text: Block Chain technology (as well as DAOs and Dapps) has become a fashionable topic. It results in a lot of confusion around these terms, technology and real life applications.

I have started a section "Difference Between" on my Cryptoacademy Wiki - a collection of comparisons between different blockchain projects and initiatives. The purpose of Cryptoacademy is to reduce the amount of bs currently circulating in the area of blockchain technology.

On this page projects and platforms involving decentralized consensus, block chain technology, and used for building Distributed Applications are compared to each other. Some comparisons are pretty obvious, and directed towards people less familiar with this area. This page is inspired by [http://www.differencebetween.net/ Deffirencebetween.net]
